casebody.data:
Ganesh Bharrat
v.
Commissioner of Correction Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2016 Douglas H. Butler, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Harry Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Ganesh Bharrat's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn. App. 158 , 143 A.3d 1106 (2016), is denied.
